import React from 'react' import './About.scss' export const About = ({ title }) => { return(

About Me

Hey! My name is vania and i am front-end developer and web designer. i graduated from such courses as: Skillbox - in front-end developer and Moscow digital academy in rhe field of web design. At the moment I am studying and diving deeper into web development. I believe that the most important thing in life is to find yourself and what you like. I am very glad that i have chosen this path. This motivates me and so I move on. Patience and a little effort.

Workin with me - you will receive quality work from me. I give my best and understand the client /employer well. I also learn and adapt quickly!

What can I Offer You

{ title }
) }
